name: Bug Anomaly
description:
Bug Anomaly[Beta1.0] is a game where you are trying to Find intentional bug

some of the bugs include: Pausing next to a movable object (big obstructing wall or box) ; Moving thru walkthru walls ; picking up an object while crouching and letting it go without standing up.

Controls : 

WASD  - Move

LeftClick - use Portal

E - Pick up objects

Space - Jump

Leftshift - Crouch

Pause - P
